* libjpeg-turbo - 0.6.21  (2018-03-25)
https://github.com/libjpeg-turbo/libjpeg-turbo


* libexif - 0.6.21        (2012-07-12)
https://libexif.github.io/


* zlib - 1.2.11           (2017-01-15)
http://zlib.net/


* libpng - 1.6.34         (2017-09-29)
http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html
(tar.gz version, since ZIP version for Windows is missing some files)


* lua - 5.3.4             (2017-01-12)
http://www.lua.org/


* libcurl - 7.60.0        (2018-05-16)
http://curl.haxx.se/


* ffmpeg - 4.0.1          (2018-06-16)
https://www.ffmpeg.org/


* Scintilla - 3.7.6       (2017-08-08)
http://www.scintilla.org/
    

* qtpropertybrowser
QtPropertyBrowser comes as part of Qt Solutions Archive
https://github.com/qtproject/qt-solutions

The version used corresponds to the below revision:
SHA-1: 4ac977553f2b04a54feb74ebcbc90ef255d38895 (committed on 2013-10-04)
